original_text:
Magic Target
Prendi la mira e spara per ottenere fantastiche caratteristiche speciali e aumentare le tue vittorie con Magic Target!
Questa slot online a 5 rulli è una vera bomba! Magic Target presenta 20 linee di pagamento e simboli tradizionali simili a cartoni animati che esaltano l’atmosfera retrò del gioco. Frutti succosi, corone d’oro, campanelle, bombe, sette e jolly ti aspettano per aiutarti a vincere, quindi fai girare i rulli!
Una grafica esplosiva
La grafica colorata rende Magic Target molto piacevole dal punto di vista estetico, con le stelle dorate che aleggiano sul caldo sfondo rosso. Ma l’aspetto non è tutto, giusto? Ecco perché Magic Target vi offre dei bonus fantastici per aiutarvi a vincere di più. Quindi, se vi piacciono le vibrazioni classiche e i simboli colorati, ma volete anche aumentare le vostre possibilità di vincere in grande con interessanti caratteristiche speciali, dovreste tentare la fortuna con questa slot.
Preparatevi a un enorme botto una volta che il simbolo della bomba atterra sul mulinello così come rappresenta il simbolo dello Spargimento. Non solo paga in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli, ma ti premia anche con 10 giri gratis – tutto quello che devi fare è raccogliere almeno tre Scatter in qualsiasi punto dei rulli da sinistra a destra, partendo dal rullo più a sinistra! Inoltre, durante i Free Spins, i simboli del cannone che fungono da moltiplicatore possono atterrare sulla bobina centrale per raddoppiare la tua vittoria! E non finisce qui! Nella slot è presente anche il Wild Symbol, rappresentato dal jolly, che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne Scatter e Multiplier per aumentare le tue possibilità di vincere ancora di più. E sarete entusiasti quando raddoppierete le vostre vittorie con la funzione di gioco d’azzardo!
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Come è facile intuire, nella video slot gratuita Magic Target ci sono i classici personaggi delle slot vintage degli anni ’80, ovvero vari frutti: arance, uva, ciliegie, prugne e pere. Tutti i simboli hanno il loro moltiplicatore di vincita, quindi controllate la tabella delle vincite prima di fare le scommesse. Inoltre, la slot utilizza come un altro gruppo di simboli i valori delle carte dal 10 all’asso, che spesso formano delle linee e possono portare una piccola vincita. Inoltre, c’è una serie di simboli di gioco estesi nella macchina da gioco Magic Target, che vi aiuterà ad aumentare significativamente le vostre vincite: Wild è un’icona Joker in un cappello colorato che può cadere su qualsiasi tamburo da gioco. Wild sostituisce qualsiasi personaggio della linea tranne lo scatter; Scatter è una corona d’oro. Se si raccolgono sulla linea attiva combo di 3 o più Scatter, si ottengono 15 giri bonus, che si possono riavviare nel processo. Il moltiplicatore vincente di qualsiasi combo ottenuta nel round di bonus è x3. L’icona in forma di cannone, cadendo in una qualsiasi cella del campo e con la partecipazione alla linea attiva, aumenta la vincita per ogni round della metà. Per ricevere il jackpot, è necessario raccogliere una linea di 5 Jolly, giocando alle quote più alte possibili.
Il gioco della slot-machine Magic Target offre ai suoi giocatori la possibilità di giocare 2 giochi extra:
Bonus Rounds – Quando compaiono 3 o più Scatter Bombs, vengono assegnati 10 giri gratis. Non possono essere recuperate, ma durante questa funzione, potrebbero apparire delle cannonate scatter scatter, e in questo modo si moltiplica la vittoria del turno in corso.
Modalità Gamble – dopo ogni turno vincente lo scommettitore ha la possibilità di giocare d’azzardo, e in questo modo aumenta il guadagno poche volte. Gli verrà data la possibilità di scegliere la carta rossa o nera. Scegliendo il diritto la loro vincita sarà raddoppiata. Scegliendo il colore sbagliato, perderanno tutto quello che hanno vinto durante quel giro. Inoltre, c’è l’opzione di riscuotere la metà dell’incasso del turno corrente.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Wazdan ci sa sicuramente fare quando si tratta di produrre software per l’Online Gambling. Se ti interessano altri titoli di questo produttore di Slot Machine simili a quello di cui ti abbiamo appena parlato, possiamo suggerirti il sequel, ossia Magic Target Deluxe, che mantiene la stessa grafica accattivante ma propone nuove funzioni e, soprattutto, una percentuale di RTP ancora più alta!

raw_translation.response:
Magic Target
Take aim and shoot to unlock fantastic special features and increase your winnings with Magic Target! This 5-reel online slot is a true bombshell! Magic Target has 20 paylines and traditional cartoon-like symbols that enhance the game's retro atmosphere. Juicy fruits, golden crowns, bells, bombs, sevens, and wilds await you to help you win big, so spin the reels! 

Explosive Graphics 
The colorful graphics make Magic Target visually pleasing, with golden stars hovering over the warm red background. But looks aren't everything, right? That's why Magic Target offers fantastic bonuses to help you win more. So if you like classic vibes and colorful symbols, but also want to increase your chances of winning big with interesting special features, you should try your luck with this slot.

Prepare for a big bang once the bomb symbol lands on the reel as it represents the Scatter symbol. Not only does it pay out in any position on the reels, but it also rewards you with 10 free spins - all you have to do is collect at least three Scatters anywhere on the reels from left to right, starting from the leftmost reel! Additionally, during Free Spins, cannon symbols that act as multipliers can land on the middle reel to double your win! And that's not all! The Wild symbol, represented by the joker, is also present in the slot and replaces all symbols except Scatter and Multiplier to increase your chances of winning even more. And you'll be thrilled when you double your winnings with the gamble feature!

Game Features and Symbols 
As you might expect, the free video slot Magic Target features classic characters from vintage 80s slots, namely various fruits: oranges, grapes, cherries, plums, and pears. All symbols have their own win multiplier, so check the payout table before placing bets. Additionally, the slot uses a group of symbols that represent card values from 10 to Ace, which often form lines and can bring a small win. Furthermore, there is a range of extended gameplay symbols in the Magic Target slot machine that will significantly help you increase your winnings: the Wild symbol is a Joker icon in a colored hat that can fall on any game reel. Wild replaces any character on the line except the Scatter; the Scatter is a golden crown. When you collect a combo of 3 or more Scatters on the active line, you are rewarded with 15 bonus spins, which can be restarted in the process. The winning multiplier of any combo obtained in the bonus round is x3. The cannon icon, falling in any cell on the field and participating in the active line, increases the win for each round by half. To receive the jackpot, you need to collect a line of 5 Jokers, playing at the highest possible odds. 

The Magic Target slot machine game offers its players the chance to play 2 extra games: 
Bonus Rounds - When 3 or more Scatter Bombs appear, 10 free spins are awarded. They cannot be redeemed, but during this feature, scatter cannon symbols may appear, multiplying the current round's winnings. 
Gamble Mode - After every winning round, the bettor has the chance to gamble and increase their earnings a few times. They will be given the choice of the red or black card. Choosing the right will double their win. Choosing the wrong color will result in losing everything they won during the round. Additionally, there is an option to collect half of the current round's earnings. 

Similar Slot Machines 
Wazdan certainly knows how to produce software for Online Gambling. If you're interested in other titles from this Slot Machine manufacturer similar to the one we just mentioned, we can suggest the sequel, Magic Target Deluxe, which maintains the same eye-catching graphics but offers new features and, most importantly, an even higher RTP percentage!

Please remove any part of the text that is like an FAQ.

Magic Target
Take aim and shoot to get fantastic special features and increase your winnings with Magic Target! This 5-reel online slot is a real bomb! Magic Target features 20 paylines and traditional cartoon-like symbols that enhance the game's retro atmosphere. Juicy fruits, golden crowns, bells, bombs, sevens, and wilds are waiting for you to help you win, so spin those reels!

Explosive Graphics
The colorful graphics make Magic Target visually appealing, with golden stars floating above the warm red background. But looks aren't everything, right? That's why Magic Target offers fantastic bonuses to help you win more. So, if you enjoy classic vibes and colorful symbols but also want to increase your chances of winning big with interesting special features, you should try your luck with this slot.

Get ready for a huge explosion once the bomb symbol lands on the reel as it represents the Scatter symbol. Not only does it pay in any position on the reels, but it also rewards you with 10 free spins - all you have to do is collect at least three Scatters anywhere on the reels from left to right, starting from the leftmost reel! Additionally, during Free Spins, cannon symbols that act as multipliers can land on the middle reel to double your win! And it doesn't end there! The slot also features the Wild Symbol, represented by the Joker, which replaces all symbols except for the Scatter and Multiplier to increase your chances of winning even more. And you'll be thrilled when you double your winnings with the gamble feature!

Slot Machine Functions and Symbols
As you might expect, the Magic Target free video slot features classic characters from 80s vintage slots, namely various fruits: oranges, grapes, cherries, plums, and pears. All symbols have their own win multiplier, so check the paytable before placing bets. Additionally, the slot uses another group of symbols - card values from 10 to Ace, which often form lines and can bring small wins. There is also a set of extended game symbols in the Magic Target slot machine that will help you significantly increase your winnings: Wild is a Joker icon in a colorful hat that can fall on any game reel. Wild replaces any character on the line except for the Scatter; Scatter is a golden crown. If you collect a combo of 3 or more Scatters on the active line, you get 15 bonus spins, which can be restarted in the process. The winning multiplier for any combo obtained in the bonus round is x3. The cannon-shaped icon, falling on any cell of the field and participating in the active line, increases the win for each round by half. To receive the jackpot, you need to collect a line of 5 Jokers, playing at the highest possible odds.

The Magic Target slot machine game offers its players the opportunity to play 2 extra games:

Bonus Rounds – When 3 or more Scatter Bombs appear, 10 free spins are awarded. They can't be recovered, but during this feature, scatter cannon shots may appear, thereby multiplying the current round's winnings.

Gamble Mode – after every winning round, the bettor has the chance to gamble and in this way increase their earnings a few times. They will be given the chance to choose the red or black card. Choosing the right one will double their win. Choosing the wrong color will make them lose everything they won during that round. Additionally, there is an option to collect half the winnings from the current round.

Other Similar Slot Machines
Wazdan knows how to produce online gambling software like no other. If you're interested in other titles from this slot machine producer similar to the one we just talked about, we suggest the sequel, Magic Target Deluxe, which maintains the same catchy graphics but offers new features and, above all, a even higher RTP percentage!

Review:
 
Game Layout and Graphics

Magic Target is a 5-reel online slot that features traditional cartoon-like symbols for a retro atmosphere. The graphics are colorful, with golden stars floating above the warm red background, making Magic Target visually appealing.

Paylines and Symbols

Magic Target features 20 fixed paylines with classic symbols like juicy fruits, golden crowns, bells, bombs, sevens, and wilds. All symbols have their own win multiplier, so it's essential to check the paytable before placing bets. There is also a set of extended game symbols in the Magic Target slot machine that will help you significantly increase your winnings.

Scatter and Wild Symbols

The Scatter Symbol in Magic Target is represented by the bomb symbol. If you land at least three Scatters on the reels from left to right, starting from the leftmost reel, you will trigger 10 free spins, during which cannon symbols that act as multipliers can land on the middle reel to double your win. The Wild Symbol is represented by the Joker icon in a colorful hat and replaces all symbols except for the Scatter and Multiplier to increase your chances of winning big.

Free Spins and Bonus Rounds

Magic Target offers fantastic bonuses to help you win more. If you collect at least three Scatters anywhere on the reels, you will trigger a free spins round, during which you can also trigger cannon symbols that act as multipliers on the middle reel to double your win! Additionally, there is a bonus round where 10 free spins are triggered when 3 or more Scatter Bombs appear. During this feature, scatter cannon shots may appear, thereby multiplying the current round's winnings.

Gamble Feature

After every winning round in Magic Target, bettors have the option to gamble and in this way increase their earnings a few times. They will be given the chance to choose between red or black card. Choosing the right one will double their win, while choosing the wrong color will make them lose everything they won during that round. Additionally, there is an option to collect half the winnings from the current round.

Jackpot and Sequel

To receive the jackpot in Magic Target, you need to collect a line of 5 Jokers, playing at the highest possible odds. If you enjoyed Magic Target, you may want to try out the sequel, Magic Target Deluxe, which maintains the same catchy graphics but offers new features and a higher RTP percentage!
